# eraserType

**Instance Property**

The behavior adopted by the eraser when deleting content.

## Declaration

```swift
var eraserType: PKEraserTool.EraserType { get set }
```

## Getting the eraser type

- **PKEraserTool.EraserType**: Constants that indicate the behavior of the eraser.
